parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register account, add security key and verify that it can be removed when not verified, check that login does not require mfa after removal.

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register account, add security key and verify that it can be removed when verified, check that login does not require mfa after removal.

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register account, add security key and verify that it (mfa) is not needed for logging in to eduID when turned off in advanced settings.

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register new account. Confirm identity by Freja. Reset password without extra security, verify that identity is no longer verified. Click 'Not you' at start page to be forced to fill in email

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register account, Add Extra security key in Advanced Settings, immediately init verification of the security key using BankID

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Check that user/pw is requested at log in same session after previous log out

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Log in with remember me enabled, log out and verify that username is pre-filled for next login

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Log in with remember me disabled, log out and verify that username is not pre-filled for next login

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Log in with remember me disabled, log out and verify that username is not pre-filled for next login. Enable remember me, log in and log out. Check that username is pre-filled and remember me is enabled

parameter.value: Initiate Register of new account, abort at terms. Then trigger multiple account register reject function by attempt to register more/same accounts in the same session

parameter.value: Register a new account, use custom password

parameter.value: Try to register new account with already existing user name

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register new account. Confirm identity by Freja. After delete account, restore account by reset password (using custom password) using Freja eID and check that identity still is confirmed.

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register new account. Confirm identity by letter, then check that Display name is present at Settings page.

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register new account. Confirm identity by Freja ID verify that the confirmation of identity can be deleted.

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Check the Help pages

parameter.value: Register account, Add Extra security key in Advanced Settings, use Security key option mfa login to verify the Extra security key and Freja eID when deleting the account

parameter.value: Register new account. Confirm identity by eIDAS and Freja eID

parameter.value: Register new account. Attempt to confirm identity by Freja without Swedish personal identity number (no complete confirmation will be done)

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Initiate Register of new account, verify that incorrect email verification code entered three times aborts email verification process with error message

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register account, Add Extra security key in Advanced Settings, attempt to verify the Security key without the nin-cookie set. I.e. Security key verification will fail. When deleting the account, the extra Delete pop-up that is required 5 min after log in, is verified.

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register a user, reset password and select BankID as extra security option. Cancel and at BankID page and continue the reset pw using mail option, verify that the identity is still verified.
